abstract.t: The Web Real-Time Communication (WebRTC) working group is charged to provide protocol support for direct interactive rich communication using audio, video, and data between two peers' web-browsers. This document describes the non-media data transport aspects of the WebRTC framework. It provides an architectural overview of how the Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) is used in the WebRTC context as a generic transport service allowing Web Browser to exchange generic data from peer to peer.
